meanings.definition: Viroids: Infectious agents that are smaller than viruses and consist only of a single, circular RNA molecule.
meanings.sent1: The viroids spread quickly among the plants in the garden.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying how viroids affect plant health.
meanings.sent3: The viroids decided to have a dance party in the plant cells.
meanings.sent4: The viroids crept through the plants like tiny spies.
meanings.sent5: The farmer could see the viroids under the microscope, swirling around like tiny tornadoes.

meanings.definition: Viroids: Small, circular RNA molecules that can infect plants and cause diseases.
meanings.sent1: Gardeners need to protect their plants from viroids.
meanings.sent2: Viroids can lead to serious crop damage if left unchecked.
meanings.sent3: The viroids played hide and seek with the plant immune system.
meanings.sent4: The viroids invaded the plant cells like tiny invaders.
meanings.sent5: The viroids multiplied rapidly, spreading their harmful effects throughout the garden.
